data.lyric:
[ti:Sanctuary]
[ar:Joji]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sanctuary - Joji
[00:04.09]Lyrics by：Joji/Luke Niccoli/Justin Raisen/Daniel Wilson
[00:08.18]Composed by：Joji/Luke Niccoli/Justin Raisen/Daniel Wilson
[00:12.28]Go ahead and bark after dark
[00:15.47]Fallen star I'm your one call away
[00:24.07]Motel halls neon walls
[00:26.81]When night falls I am your escape
[00:35.52]When you lay alone I ache
[00:40.80]Something I wanted to feel
[00:46.59]If you've been waitin' for fallin' in love
[00:51.01]Babe you don't have to wait on me
[00:57.98]'Cause I've been aimin' for Heaven above
[01:02.64]But an angel ain't what I need
[01:09.27]Not anyone you're the one
[01:12.61]More than fun you're the sanctuary
[01:20.89]'Cause what you want is what I want
[01:24.43]Sincerity
[01:32.54]Souls that dream alone lie awake
[01:37.98]I'll give you somethin' so real
[01:43.68]If you've been waitin' for fallin' in love
[01:48.20]Babe you don't have to wait on me
[01:55.13]'Cause I've been aimin' for Heaven above
[01:59.66]But an angel ain't what I need
[02:05.56]Pull me oh so close
[02:08.27]'Cause you never know
[02:11.19]Just how long our lives will be
[02:18.02]If you've been waitin' for fallin' in love
[02:22.60]Babe you don't have to wait on me
[02:29.43]'Cause I've been aimin' for Heaven above
[02:33.89]But an angel ain't what I need
data.trans:
[ti:Sanctuary]
[ar:Joji]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.09]//
[00:08.18]//
[00:12.28]天黑之后传来声声狗吠 继续前行 
[00:15.47]星辰陨落 我是你的唯一 令他人退让
[00:24.07]汽车旅馆的厅堂 墙上闪烁的霓虹灯
[00:26.81]暮色渐浓之时 我是你的庇护所
[00:35.52]看你孤枕难眠 我会忍不住心痛
[00:40.80]我想感受到你的心思
[00:46.59]你是否期待爱情的降临
[00:51.01]宝贝 你不用等我
[00:57.98]因为我心比天高
[01:02.64]但天使并不能让我动容
[01:09.27]非你莫属 
[01:12.61]更有魅力的是 你在我心中神圣不可侵犯
[01:20.89]你想要的就是我的首选
[01:24.43]千真万确
[01:32.54]孤独的灵魂 朝夕无以为伴
[01:37.98]我会给你一片真心
[01:43.68]如果你期待着爱情的降临
[01:48.20]宝贝 你不用等我
[01:55.13]因为我心比天高
[01:59.66]但天使并不能让我动容
[02:05.56]救救痴情的我 哦 如此接近
[02:08.27]你永远不知道
[02:11.19]我们生命的尽头在何处
[02:18.02]如果你期待着爱情的降临
[02:22.60]宝贝 你不用等我
[02:29.43]因为我心比天高
[02:33.89]但天使并不能让我动容
